text: Charles Kwabla Akonnor (born 12 March 1974) is a Ghanaian football manager and former player who most recently managed the Ghana national team. A former midfielder, he spent most of his club career in Germany. He made 51 appearances for the Ghana national team scoring 13 goals. == Honours == === Player === Ghana * African Youth Championship: 1993, third place: 1991 * FIFA U-20 World Cup runner up: 1993 === Manager === Dreams * Ghana Division One League Zone III: 2015 Asante Kotoko * GFA Normalization Committee Special Competition: 2019 Individual * Ghana Premier League Coach of the Month: March 2018 * Ghana Football Awards Manager of the Year: 2019 * AFCON Team of the Tournament & CAF African 11 Team of the Year: 1998 ==Notes== == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Ghanaian football managers
title: Charles Akonnor
